    • archiveDrug

      boolean archiveDrug(LoggedInInfo info, int drugId, int demographicId, String reason)
      Archives a drug. This will remove the drug from the current list. The drug can still be found under the 'All' section.
      Parameters:
      info - Logged-in user information.
      drugId - The ID of the drug to archive.
      demographicId - The demographic ID.
      reason - The reason for archiving the drug.
      Returns:
      True if the drug was successfully archived, false otherwise.
